oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Century II Promotions Show (19448)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Happy Goodman Family (Musical group); Metal photoplates;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color half sheet (red and black on white) announcing the Century II Promotions concert with the Saga Brothers and Naomi, the Thrasher Brothers, the Kingsman, Wendy Bagwell and Sunliters, the Telestials, The Florida Boys, the Blackwood Brothers, and the Happy Goodman Family. Poster features metal photoplates of Saga Brothers and Naomi, the Thrasher Brothers, the Kingsman, Wendy Bagwell and Sunliters, the Telestials, The Florida Boys, the Blackwood Brothers, and the Happy Goodman Family.
